titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the authority, stile, and perfection of the books of the Old and New-Testament with a continued illustration of several difficult texts of scripture throughout the whole work / by John Edwards.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Richard Wilkin at the King's-Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 2 (E202A) and vol.3 (E202B) also appear at reel positions 2389:2b-c.
